newsitem.title: UK: Sony UK sells 50,000 PlayStations in week.
newsitem.headline: Sony UK sells 50,000 PlayStations in week.

text.p: Sony Computer Entertainment, a unit of Sony Corp, on Tuesday said it sold 50,000 units of its PlayStation game machine in the UK in the week March 22-29.
Sony Computer Entertainment's UK division said in a statement that this was the largest single week's sales of any console since Christmas last year.
Last week, Sony said that following surging worldwide demand it would boost monthly production of the 32-bit video game console to 1.5 million units in May from the current one million.
